title: That the General Committee meeting minutes of March 18, 2024 be approved.

That items Report CAO24-001 - Appointment, Report LSRS24-003 - Property Acquisition, Report FCSFS24-006 - 2023 Council Remuneration and Expense Statements, Report CSRS24-002 - Agreements with the Peterborough Rugby Union Football Club, Report IPGPL24-003 - Zoning By-law Amendment for 720 Vinette Street, Report CAOGR24-002 - Government Relations Matters - Update for April 2, 2024, Report CAOGR24-003 - Physician Recruitment Action Plan, Report LSOCS24-005 - Jurisdiction of Ontario's Ombudsman, Report LSMLES24-001 - Municipal Law Enforcement Amendments, Report IPGACP24-003 - Climate Change Action Plan 2.0 Update, Report IPGENG24-005 - Central Area (Bethune Street) Flood Reduction Project: Increase in Agreement for Detailed Design and Contract Administration, and , Report CSRS24-004 - Request for Delegated Authority to obtain liquor sales licences in City Facilities.

That Council approve the recommendations outlined in Report CSD24-002, dated April 2, 2024 of the Commissioner of Community Services as follows: a) That the recommendations of the Community Project Grants Committee in the total amount of $20,965 be allocated to various community groups as described in Appendix A; and b) That the recommendations of the Community Investment Grant Advisory Committee in the total amount of $136,170 be allocated to various local charitable and Not-For-Profit organizations (NFP’s) as described in Appendix B
That the Rules of Procedure (section 14.2) be suspended to continue the meeting past the hour of 10:00 p.m. to complete the agenda.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CAOPC24-003, dated April 8, 2024 of the Chief Administrative Officer as follows: That the Minutes of Settlement between the City and CUPE 504 dated March 7, 2024 that sets out new terms for a Collective Agreement covering the three-year period January 1, 2024 to December 31, 2026, be approved.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CAOPC24-003, dated April 8, 2024 of the Chief Administrative Officer as follows: That the Minutes of Settlement between the City and CUPE 504 dated March 7, 2024 that sets out new terms for a Collective Agreement covering the three-year period January 1, 2024 to December 31, 2026, be approved. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-003 dated April 8, 2024, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from Police Chief Betts be received for information.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CAOPC24-003, dated April 8, 2024 of the Chief Administrative Officer as follows: That the Minutes of Settlement between the City and CUPE 504 dated March 7, 2024 that sets out new terms for a Collective Agreement covering the three-year period January 1, 2024 to December 31, 2026, be approved. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-003 dated April 8, 2024, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from Police Chief Betts be received for information. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSMLES24-002, dated April 8, 2024 of the Commissioner, Legislative Services as follows: That Council pass a by-law in the form of amending by-law comprising Appendix A to Report LSMLES24-002 to amend Parks and Facilities By-law 19-074.

That the following By-laws be approved: 24-021 Being a By-law to amend the Zoning By-law for the lands known municipally as 720 Vinette Street 24-022 Being a by-law to amend the Zoning By-law to remove the 'H' Holding Symbol from the Zoning of the property known as 265 Edinburgh Street 24-023 Being a by-law to amend certain by-laws 24-024 Being a By-law to amend Parks and Facilities By-law 19-074
That By-law 24-025, Being a By-law to confirm the proceedings of the Council at its meeting held on April 8, 2024, be approved.
That this meeting be adjourned at 11:09 p.m.
